Educreations (http://www.educreations.com) - Full Time or Intern in Palo Alto, CA

Educreations is the easiest way for teachers to teach online. We're growing fast, and have a crazy awesome iPad app that hit the #1 spot after 4 days in the app store. We're unabashidly inspired by the Khan Academy but want to enable all teachers to teach like Sal Khan. We were part of the first cohort of Imagine K12 and are looking to grow the team rapidly.

We are looking to make our first hires. If you want to change the world and are a strong Python hacker, have experience with Objective C or are an awesome designer, we want to talk to you.

Email jobs@educreations.com

We are looking for:

    Lead Software Engineer (Python)
    Lead Mobile Engineer (Objective C/Cocoa)
    Lead UX/UI Designer
